title: Trust in the Lord
itunes:title: Trust in the Lord
description: Friends, a connection with God leads to life and flourishing. When we sever that connection, we experience a drought similar to the one in our first reading today. The Lord responds to our needs, so trust in his providence, and he will not abandon you.

itunes:author: Bishop Robert Barron
